name: IntegriChain
overview: IntegriChain, Inc. provides sales and distribution analytics and reporting services to the healthcare industry. The company’s solutions include Market Vigilance, which monitors the channel for illicit trading activities, including counterfeit and parallel importation; and Brand Vigilance, which quantifies product diversion, as well as reduces chargebacks and rebates, and identifies the geographic regions and businesses engaged in illicit trade. The companyâ€™s solutions also include Demand Vigilance, which validates outlet-level demand data, and identifies data integrity and completeness problems improving forecasting and product visibility in the channel; and Dynamic NextGen AnalyticsT platform that helps pharmaceutical manufacturers unlock the value of direct data through data integration, enrichment, and guided analytics. In addition, IntegriChain, Inc offers Enriched Channel Sales, which is a pharmacy identified sell-in dataset built from actual sales data; Measurement of Retail Inventory that measures inventory in the retail channel and quantify inaccuracies; Chargeback Validation reports that support trade operations and finance; and support services, including risk and ROI analysis, strategy, implementation, and help desk. Further, the companyâ€™s solutions allow manufacturers to identify and monitor the impact of commercial decisions on various outlets and points of care. The company serves pharmaceutical, biotech, and medical device companies. IntegriChain, Inc. was founded in 2007 and is based in Princeton, New Jersey.

funding_rounds.source_description: IntegriChain Inc., a Princeton, N.J.-based provider of secure chain intelligence, has raised $2 million in Series A funding led by the NJTC Venture Fund
